title: Reporting a cheating on cs
body:
ID: joke5050

I just watched my replay game, and he was cheating on cs as Karthus
When he killed wolf, cs went up to 4, and when he killed blue, his cs went up to 8, and when he killed the frog, his cs went up to 12. GREAT.
Almost doubling cs.

Let's see if you guys are actually working on this hack issue.

replies.body: Not cheating all camps give 4 cs now so you cant figure out jg paths by cs.  Been like that for a while now.
Solved. Altho midlane Karthus with smite? Def not solved. Woof man that cheese hurts.

> [{quoted}](name=Bazerka,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=YYYTgzXU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-11T22:38:58.418+0000)
>
> Solved. Altho midlane Karthus with smite? Def not solved. Woof man that cheese hurts.

karthus with smite is the new cheese boosting strategy

>
> Solved. Altho midlane Karthus with smite? Def not solved. Woof man that cheese hurts.

Wasnt it like popular the first few days of scuttle for mid to have smite before it fell out of favor again though?
Someones a bit behind on patch notes.
Everything is cheating when you don't know how the game works...
